houses.title: Ultra-Modern Seafront Villa
houses.description: Stunning contemporary seafront villa with direct private beach access and a 25-meter infinity pool overlooking the Mediterranean. Features smart-home automation, floor-to-ceiling glass walls, a rooftop terrace with jacuzzi, cinema room, and staff quarters. Built in 2024 with Italian marble and German fittings.

houses.title: Sky Penthouse Lac 2
houses.description: Exclusive full-floor penthouse on the top of the newest tower in Lac 2. 360° panoramic views of the lake and Tunis skyline. Private elevator, 4 en-suite bedrooms, huge 200 m² terrace with outdoor kitchen and jacuzzi. Fully furnished with Roche Bobois & Minotti pieces.

houses.title: Designer Cliff Villa
houses.description: Architect-designed masterpiece hanging on the cliffs of La Marsa with dramatic sea views from every room. Heated infinity pool, Japanese garden, wellness area with hammam & sauna, wine cellar, and a glass elevator connecting all 3 levels.

houses.title: Luxury Studio Corniche
houses.description: Brand-new designer studio right on Sousse Corniche with direct sea view. King-size bed, fully equipped kitchen, 55-inch smart TV, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a huge balcony perfect for sunset dinners. 24/7 security and private parking included.

houses.title: White & Blue Sidi Bou Said Villa
houses.description: Iconic Andalusian-style villa in the heart of Sidi Bou Said with the famous white walls and cobalt-blue doors that made the village famous. Restored in 2023 keeping all original features: zellige tiles, wooden painted ceilings, interior patio with fountain, and breathtaking sea views from the rooftop.

houses.title: Private Beachfront Palace
houses.description: One-of-a-kind beachfront palace with 80 meters of private sandy beach. Three swimming pools (including indoor heated), private cinema, gym, tennis court, helipad, and 24/7 staff accommodation. Perfect for large families or luxury events.
